ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 4th day of October, 2007, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED, LIMITED TO the issue set forth below. Allocatur is DENIED as to all remaining issues. The issue, rephrased for clarity, is:
Whether the Superior Court erred in determining that the expert extrapolation method was appropriate for determining weight of a controlled substance where the amount at issue minimally exceeds the weight required to impose a mandatory sentence.
